org.cyclops.cyclopscore.ingredient.recipe

Interface IRecipeInputOutputDefinitionRegistry

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IRegistry
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecipeInputOutputDefinitionRegistry

    public interface IRecipeInputOutputDefinitionRegistry
extends IRegistry
    Regsitry for handlers for for the conversion between IRecipeDefinition and IRecipe.
